main event: An unknown aerial object was observed by an Air Force pilot over Dayton, Ohio on February 10, 1949.
interesting points: The object was larger than a star and had a round shape,The object was observed traveling at approximately 900 to 1000 mph,The sighting lasted around 5 seconds and the object broke into two pieces before disintegrating,The pilot noted a long tail behind the object,The object emitted a brilliant white light with a pale blue glow on the bottom before fading to orange.
sighted object: round aerial object with a long tail
